shortdesc.ph: Occurs when a specified remote user enables/disables the video module.

dlentry.dd:
Deprecated as of v2.9.0. This callback is deprecated, please use instead:
(0) and (5).
(2) and (6).

section.p: Occurs when a specified remote user enables/disables the local video capturing function. Once the video module is disabled, the user can only use a voice call. The user cannot send or receive any video from other users.
The SDK triggers this callback when the remote user resumes or stops capturing the video stream by calling the method.

plentry.pd: The user ID of the remote user sending the video stream.

ul.li: : Enabled. Other users in the channel can see the video of this remote user.
: Disabled. Other users in the channel can no longer receive the video stream from this remote user, while this remote user can still receive the video streams from other users.
